title: Mobile Application Developer
description: Contributed to existing production apps including AI Planner and Caregiver Management App.
Integrated ChatGPT (GPT-4.1) with structured outputs and parallel function calling to automate scheduling and task extraction from user conversations.:
Migrated from Claude 3.5/3.7 to OpenAI APIs with dynamic model switching, improving flexibility, maintainability, and response efficiency.
Refactored state management, resolved core logic issues, and delivered polished UI with improved performance and feature stability.
shortDescription: Contributed to AI Planner and Caregiver Management App using GPT-4.1 with structured outputs and parallel function calling.
Migrated Claude 3.5/3.7 to OpenAI APIs with dynamic model switching for improved flexibility and response efficiency.
Refactored state management, resolved core logic issues, and delivered polished UI with enhanced performance.

title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained Flutter-based mobile apps including Side Hustle, AcademIQ, and Diecarz, spanning gamified rewards, AI-driven education, and social platforms.
Implemented secure, multi-platform authentication (Apple Sign-In, Google OAuth) and integrated tracking/analytics SDKs (Singular, AppsFlyer, Adjust).
Built AI-powered conversational features in AcademIQ using ChatGPT APIs, including structured outputs, custom chat modes, and offline support via Isar DB.
Delivered responsive UI, scalable Firebase integrations, and collaborated across sprints to ensure clean architecture and timely feature rollouts.
shortDescription: Developed Flutter mobile apps (Side Hustle, AcademIQ, Diecarz) with gamified rewards, AI-driven education, and social features.
Implemented multi-platform authentication (Apple Sign-In, Google OAuth) and integrated analytics (Singular, AppsFlyer, Adjust).
Built AI conversational features in AcademIQ using ChatGPT APIs with structured outputs, custom modes, and offline Isar DB support.
